tool_description: Echo API that answer everything that you send back to you. Supports GET, POST, DELETE, PUT and PATCH.
title: echo-api

api_list.name: Echo PUT
api_list.description: Make a HTTP PUT request with the code you like to get in the response.

api_list.name: Echo DELETE
api_list.description: Make a HTTP DELETE  request with the code you like to get in the response.

api_list.name: Echo GET
api_list.description: Make a HTTP GET request with the code you like to get in the response.

api_list.name: Echo PATCH
api_list.description: Make a HTTP PATCH request with the code you like to get in the response.

api_list.name: Echo POST
api_list.description: Make a HTTP POST request with the code you like to get in the response.

api_list.name: Echo POST
api_list.description: Make a HTTP POST request with the code you like to get in the response.
